casebody.data:
APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

2007-0640. Eurand Am., Inc. v. Dohme.

Montgomery App. No. 21520, 2007-Ohio-865. Sua sponte, discretionary appeal is also accepted on Proposition of Law No. I. Both appellant and appellee shall file a merit brief addressing Proposition of Law No. I within 20 days of the date of this entry. The parties may then file reply briefs within 10 days after the filing of the initial brief.
